description: This schema represents a step in a survey task.

id.description: The identifier of this survey. We strongly recommend this to be a globally unique value.

sensors.description: A list of strings identifying active sensors

settings.description: A map of custom settings defined by the type of step

private.description: Boolean signifying if the result of this step should be treated as sensitive data

skippable.description: Boolean value signifying if the skip option should be visible
